TopicTitle: Ksp update on enhanced edition on ps4

Articles.Content: Didnt see any information about it on the ksp board but update 1.15 was released on ps4 today and was wondering what changes are included in this update
Its some Ps5 stuff and bug fixes. Pretty disappointing.
yeah thought so too could be another year or two before 1.11/1.12 comes out for console.
